author: USA TODAY, Curtis Tate, USA TODAY
title: Blue Ivy Carter's coronavirus PSA: 'This is why it's important to wash your hands'
description: Blue Ivy Carter, 8-year-old daughter of Beyoncé and Jay-Z, has in important video message during the coronavirus pandemic: Wash your hands.
content:
Beyonce and Blue Ivy Carter attend the NBA All-Star Game 2018 at Staples Center on Feb. 18, 2018, in Los Angeles.
 (Photo: Allen Berezovsky, Getty Images)
